member.name: T:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.StickySession
member.summary: Represents a sticky session binding a client to a specific backend.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.StickySession.ClientId
member.summary: Client identifier (typically IP address or value from sticky headers).

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.StickySession.FrontendId
member.summary: Frontend identifier associated with this session.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.StickySession.BackendId
member.summary: Backend identifier this client is bound to.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.StickySession.LastAccessUtc
member.summary: Last access timestamp, in UTC time. Updated each time the session is used.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.StickySession.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.exception: Thrown when required parameters are null or empty.
Thrown when expirationMs is less than or equal to zero.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.StickySession.IsExpired
member.summary: Check if the session has expired.
member.returns: True if the session has expired, false otherwise.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.StickySession.Touch(System.Int32)
member.summary: Update the last access timestamp and extend expiration if needed.
member.exception: Thrown when expirationMs is less than or equal to zero.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.StickySession.GetSessionKey
member.summary: Create a unique session key for storage.
member.returns: Session key combining client and frontend identifiers.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.RequestId
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for this request.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.ConversationId
member.summary: Gets or sets the conversation/session identifier this request belongs to.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.BackendServerId
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the backend server that handled this request.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.ClientId
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the client that initiated this request.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.RequestBodySize
member.summary: Request body size in bytes. Must be non-negative.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.RequestArrivalUtc
member.summary: Gets or sets the UTC timestamp when the request arrived at the load balancer.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.BackendSelectedUtc
member.summary: Gets or sets the UTC timestamp when a backend server was selected to handle the request.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.BackendRequestSentUtc
member.summary: Gets or sets the UTC timestamp when the request was sent to the backend server.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.FirstTokenTimeUtc
member.summary: Gets or sets the UTC timestamp when the first token was received from the backend server.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.LastTokenTimeUtc
member.summary: Gets or sets the UTC timestamp when the last token was received from the backend server.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.BackendSelectionTimeMs
member.summary: Gets the time in milliseconds between request arrival and backend server selection. Returns null if either timestamp is not set.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.TimeToFirstTokenMs
member.summary: Gets the time in milliseconds between sending the request to backend and receiving the first token. Returns null if either timestamp is not set.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.TimeToCompletionMs
member.summary: Gets the time in milliseconds between sending the request to backend and receiving the last token. Returns null if either timestamp is not set.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.TotalRequestTimeMs
member.summary: Gets the total end-to-end request time in milliseconds (from arrival to last token). Returns null if last token timestamp is not set.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Models.TelemetryMessage.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.OllamaBackend.Identifier
member.summary: Unique identifier for this origin server.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.OllamaBackend.UnhealthyThreshold
member.summary: Number of consecutive failed health checks before marking a server as unhealthy. Default is 2.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.OllamaBackend.HealthyThreshold
member.summary: Number of consecutive successful health checks before marking a server as healthy. Default is 2.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.OllamaBackend.HealthCheckMethod
member.summary: HTTP method to use when performing a healthcheck. Default is GET.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.OllamaBackend.HealthCheckUrl
member.summary: URL to use when performing a healthcheck. Default is /.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.OllamaBackend.MaxParallelRequests
member.summary: Maximum number of parallel requests to this backend. Default is 4.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.OllamaBackend.RateLimitRequestsThreshold
member.summary: Threshold at which 429 rate limit responses are sent. Default is 10.

member.summary: Boolean indicating if the full request should be logged.

member.summary: Boolean indicating if the request body should be logged.

member.summary: Boolean indicating if the response body should be logged.

member.summary: Boolean indicating if the object is active or not.

member.summary: Last update timestamp, in UTC time.

member.summary: Timestamp at which the backend was seen as healthy, in UTC time.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.OllamaBackend.UnhealthySinceUtc
member.summary: Timestamp at which the backend was seen as unhealthy, in UTC time.

member.summary: Boolean indicating whether or not the backend was chosen due to stickiness.

member.summary: Unique identifier for this API endpoint.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.OllamaFrontend.Hostname
member.summary: Hostname associated with this frontend. Use * to specify that this frontend is a catch-all.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.OllamaFrontend.TimeoutMs
member.summary: Number of milliseconds to wait before considering the request to be timed out. Default is 60 seconds.

member.summary: Maximum request body size. Default is 512MB.

member.summary: String containing JSON-serialized list of backend identifiers. Used by the database layer.

member.summary: List of models that should be present on each mapped backend Ollama server.

member.summary: String containing JSON-serialized list of required models. Used by the database layer.

member.summary: Boolean indicating if the full request should be logged.

member.summary: Boolean indicating if the request body should be logged.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.OllamaFrontend.LogResponseBody
member.summary: Boolean indicating if the response body should be logged.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.OllamaFrontend.UseStickySessions
member.summary: Boolean indicating whether sticky sessions should be used for this frontend. When enabled, clients will be routed to the same backend for subsequent requests. Default is false.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.OllamaFrontend.StickySessionExpirationMs
member.summary: Duration in milliseconds for how long a sticky session should remain active. Default is 1800000 milliseconds (30 minutes). Minimum is 10000 milliseconds (10 seconds). Maximum is 86400000 milliseconds (24 hours).

member.summary: Boolean indicating if the object is active or not.

member.summary: Last update timestamp, in UTC time.

member.name: T:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.SessionStickinessService
member.summary: Service for managing sticky sessions between clients and backends.

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.SessionStickinessService.CleanupIntervalMs
member.summary: Interval in milliseconds for cleaning up expired sessions. Default is 300000 milliseconds (5 minutes). Minimum is 10000 milliseconds (10 seconds). Maximum is 3600000 milliseconds (1 hour).

member.name: P:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.SessionStickinessService.ActiveSessionCount
member.summary: Get the total number of active sessions.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.SessionStickinessService.GetStickyBackend(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get the sticky backend for a client and frontend combination.
member.returns: Backend identifier if a valid sticky session exists, null otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown when clientId or frontendId is null or empty.

member.summary: Set a sticky backend for a client and frontend combination.
member.exception: Thrown when required parameters are null or empty.
Thrown when expirationMs is less than or equal to zero.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.SessionStickinessService.TouchSession(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Update the last access time for an existing session and extend its expiration.
member.returns: True if the session was found and updated, false otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown when clientId or frontendId is null or empty.
Thrown when expirationMs is less than or equal to zero.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.SessionStickinessService.RemoveSession(System.String,System.String)
member.returns: True if the session was found and removed, false otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown when clientId or frontendId is null or empty.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.SessionStickinessService.RemoveClientSessions(System.String)
member.summary: Remove all sessions for a specific client.
member.exception: Thrown when clientId is null or empty.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.SessionStickinessService.RemoveFrontendSessions(System.String)
member.summary: Remove all sessions associated with a specific frontend.
member.exception: Thrown when frontendId is null or empty.

member.name: M:OllamaFlow.Core.Services.SessionStickinessService.RemoveBackendSessions(System.String)
member.summary: Remove all sessions associated with a specific backend.
member.exception: Thrown when backendId is null or empty.

member.returns: List of all active sticky sessions.
